dataset_id: CLASIC07 PALS Brightness Temperature Data V001
organizations: National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: CLASIC07 PALS Brightness Temperature Data V001
summary: This data set contains brightness temperature data obtained by the Passive Active L-band System (PALS) microwave aircraft radiometer instrument as part of the Cloud and Land Surface Interaction Campaign 2007 (CLASIC07).
